TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Reference extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the element of an XML signature.

span.span: Represents the element of an XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都代表 <`reference`> 元素的 XML 數位簽章規格所定義的 XML 數位簽章。The object represents the <`reference`> element of an XML digital signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. 使用物件，以指定下列資訊：Use the object to specify the following information: - 用來簽署資料物件的摘要演算法。The digest algorithm used to sign of the data object. 這是必要值。This value is required. - 統一資源識別元 (URI) 的資料物件的登入。The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the data object to sign. URI 可以指定檔案路徑或 XML 文件中的特定項目。The URI can specify a file path or specific elements within an XML document. 這是必要值。This value is required. - 要產生摘要之前套用的轉換鏈結。A chain of transforms to apply before generating the digest. 這是選擇性的值。This value is optional. - 要簽署的物件類型。The type of object to sign. 這是選擇性的值。This value is optional. - 用來參考目前的唯一識別碼``項目。A unique identifier used to reference the current `` element. 這是選擇性的值。This value is optional. 如需詳細資訊 <`reference`> 項目，請參閱 W3C 規格在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about the <`reference`> element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生和驗證信封的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化在 URI 上進行特殊處理的資料物件`""`， `#xpointer(/)`，和`#xxxx`。This constructor initializes the object to the data at the URI with special processing for `""`, `#xpointer(/)`, and `#xxxx`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用來簽署與驗證 XML 文件使用信封簽章的類別。The following code example uses the class to sign and verify an XML document using an envelope signature. span.span: Adds a object to the list of transforms to be performed on the data before passing it to the digest algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會修改``項目和相關聯的子元素的 XML 數位簽章。The method modifies the `` element and associated subelements of an XML digital signature. 轉換會套用在所加入的順序。Transforms are applied in the order in which they were added. 如果沒有指定轉換，轉換會自動加入所需的基本。If no transforms are specified, the minimum required transforms are added automatically. 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生和驗證信封的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生及驗證已卸離的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the digest method Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the current .

span.span: Gets or sets the digest method Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the current .

value.span: 摘要方法在目前的 URI 。

span.span: The digest method URI of the current .
The default value is "http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#sha1".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性來表示使用 URI 字串 <`DigestMethod`> 元素的 XML 數位簽章。The property uses a URI string to represent the <`DigestMethod`> element of an XML digital signature. 摘要方法是用來雜湊演算法。The digest method is the algorithm used to hash the . 預設的演算法是。The default algorithm is . 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

The digest value of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性使用的位元組陣列，代表 <`DigestValue`> 元素的 XML 數位簽章。The property uses an array of bytes to represent the <`DigestValue`> element of an XML digital signature. 屬性會包含物件所描述的摘要的 Base 64 編碼值屬性。The property contains the Base 64 encoded value of the digest of the object described by the property. 屬性會自動填入適當的值，每當您呼叫。The property is automatically populated with the appropriate value whenever you make a call to . 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示 <`Transform`> 項目和相關聯的子元素的 XML 數位簽章。The property represents the <`Transform`> element and associated subelements of an XML digital signature. 轉換鏈結是轉換的已排序的清單。The transform chain is an ordered list of transforms. 這些轉換的輸出會構成中指定的雜湊演算法的輸入屬性。The output of these transforms constitutes the input to the hash algorithm specified in the property. 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Uri { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Uri : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the of the current .

span.span: Gets or sets the of the current .
The of the current .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性來表示使用統一資源識別元 (URI) 的字串 <`URI`> 元素的 XML 數位簽章。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represent the <`URI`> element of an XML digital signature. 使用屬性，以指定的文件簽署，並指定目前 XML 文件簽署，或指示，進行簽署整份文件的哪個項目位置。Use the property to specify the location of a document to sign, and to specify which element of the current XML document to sign or to indicate that the entire document should be signed. 若要成功建立的 XML 數位簽章，您必須設定屬性。To successfully create an XML digital signature, you must set the property. 下表描述您可以傳遞給的值屬性。The following table describes the values that you can pass to the property. |要簽署的物件Object to sign|傳遞給值屬性Value passed to the property| |--------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |整個 XML 文件使用信封的簽章。An entire XML document using an enveloped signature.|空字串:""An empty string: ""| |使用信封的簽章的 XML 文件中的特定項目。A specific element within an XML document using an enveloped signature.|屬性名稱之識別碼所識別的 XML 項目名稱The name of an XML element identified by an attribute name ID. 字串格式應為下列其中`IDname`是有效的屬性名稱識別碼的名稱：The string should take the following form where `IDname` is the name of a valid attribute name ID:

「 #Idname""#Idname"| |使用卸離的簽章檔案。A file using a detached signature.|檔案的 URI:"c:\data.jpg"或"c:\data.xml"。The URI of a file: "c:\data.jpg" or "c:\data.xml".| 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML 簽章語法和處理規格](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生和驗證信封的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)]
